page.title: 18COTHEY BOTTOM HERITAGE C'TRE
page.content: The Heritage Centre was opened in May 1983. A Morris 8 started the display. {The entry fee}is 70p for{adults}and 45p for{children}and{senior citizens. The exhibition consists mainly of {veteran cars and bicycles.}There are also{motor cycles and farm vehicles}on show. An interesting display depicts {rural life}during the last century. There is a large exhibition of{street {jewellery,}showing advertisements from the past few decades. Occasionally the Centre exhibits a particular vehicle for a short period of time.{Thrust 2}was displayed recently, and visitors found this very interesting. Many thousands of people enjoyed the variety of displays that the Heritage Centre offers. There is a small{gift shop}which sells postcards and souvenirs.
